price: (23) Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.
arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fawarabbi al-samāi wal-arḍi innahu laḥaqqun mith'la mā annakum tanṭiqūna
